entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is participating in a Quidditch match.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is another student at Hogwarts who is also participating in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is a student at Hogwarts who is tailing Harry closely during the Quidditch match.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends and teammates in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is a student at Hogwarts who is being pursued by Fred during the Quidditch match.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is Harry's broomstick that he uses to play Quidditch.

relationships.description: Cho Chang was tailing Harry closely during the Quidditch match.
Fred was pursuing Alicia during the Quidditch match.
Harry was using the Firebolt broomstick to play Quidditch.
